text: Dimitrios Kasoumis (8 February 1930 - 1996) was a Greek sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Greek male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Greece Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Lamia (city)
title: Dimitrios Kasoumis
